ABOUT US WHO WE ARE?

WHO WE ARE

Takns International for Petroleum Services (TIFBS), a subsidiary of Takns Holding Group established in 2015. TIFBS is offering an integrated fit-for-purpose, fit-for-use solutions and services for the Libyan national Oil & gas Sector. Focusing on our unique services and partnership spirit, our valued customers from Libyan National Oil Companies are used to receive our innovative and quality solutions. TIFBS is working to satisfy their needs via the best, most advanced and modern EPCC Projects, Solutions and Services in all Oil & Gas related streams.

READ MORE ABOUT US

WHO WE ARE

Takns International for Petroleum Services (TIFBS), a subsidiary of Takns Holding Group established in 2015. TIFBS is offering an integrated fit-for-purpose, fit-for-use solutions and services for the Libyan national Oil & gas Sector. Focusing on our unique services and partnership spirit, our valued customers from Libyan National Oil Companies are used to receive our innovative and quality solutions. TIFBS is working to satisfy their needs via the best, most advanced and modern EPCC Projects, Solutions and Services in all Oil & Gas related streams.

  • Well maintenance and operations management services
  • Production optimization and enhanced recovery services for oil and gas
